content.14/f Haley 2000/z winter/t 1000 1600/w s: spring_day_ambient/100 23/farmer 94 23 1 Haley 100 23 1/skippable/pause 2000/showFrame Haley 25/pause 500/playSound cameraNoise/shake Haley 50/screenFlash .5/pause 800/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 2 true/showFrame Haley 24/pause 500/playSound cameraNoise/shake Haley 50/screenFlash .5/move farmer 5 0 1 true/pause 1200/faceDirection Haley 3 true/showFrame Haley 27/pause 400/jump Haley/pause 600/showFrame Haley 12/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 300/speak Haley "噢！@。$8"/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 2/pause 800/speak Haley "阳光真好……我出来拍拍照片。"/pause 600/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 600/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 400/speak Haley "我想多出门走走……#$b#我想知道农民生活是什么样的。我从没想过这样的生活。#$b#直到现在……$l"/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 0/pause 800/speak Haley "呵呵，这些奶牛好可爱……"/pause 600/emote Haley 16/faceDirection Haley 3/speak Haley "嘿，我有个主意！$h"/move Haley 0 1 2/faceDirection farmer 2/playSound sandyStep/addBigProp 100 25 106/pause 600/move Haley 0 -1 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Haley "我们跟这些奶牛合张影吧！你教教我怎么接近奶牛！$h#$b#我会设置好定时器。"/move Haley 0 1 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 900/playSound openBox/move Haley 0 -1 3/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Haley 0/playMusic 50s/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/cutscene haleyCows/pause 2000/speak Haley "哞……$9"/pause 1000/speak Haley "* 咯咯 *$10#$b#太好玩了，@！这些照片也很滑稽！$10"/pause 500/speak Haley "我现在想要回家洗个澡……$10"/pause 1000/mail haleyGarden/end dialogue Haley "我从来没有这么脏过。$h"

farmer 3/pause 500/speak Leah "你比看起来还要强壮！$h"/pause 1000/speak Leah "给，尝一块……"/pause 300/farmerEat 613/pause 900/pause 1100/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/viewport move -1 1 6000/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/playMusic none/speak Leah "我刚想起来一件事。#$b#就算我的艺术生涯以失败告终，也总会有朋友在我跌落谷底的过程中捞我一把。$h"/pause 1000/end dialogue Leah "谢谢你之前的帮助……$h"
content.54/f Leah 2500/t 1100 1600/z winter/w su: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer 87 40 3 Leah 76 40 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite leahPicnic/viewport 77 40 true/move farmer -10 0 3/speak Leah "嗨，@。我知道你今天会从这路过。#$b#……所以我准备了个惊喜……$h"/faceDirection Leah 0/pause 800/speak Leah "一起小小地野餐一顿吧！$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 1/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "这是蔬菜杂烩，用我“特制”的调味品调制的。"/pause 600/move Leah -1 0 0/speak Leah "……这是新鲜的沙拉，用的是我从这座森林里采来的蔬菜！$h"/pause 600/faceDirection Leah 1/move farmer -1 0 3/faceDirection Leah 0/pause 1200/speak Leah "@，呃……$l"/faceDirection Leah 2/pause 300/faceDirection Leah 1/speak Leah "我想谢谢你……帮助我距离成为真正的艺术家又近了一步。$l"/pause 400/showFrame Leah 25/pause 100/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah 2 0/pause 50/animate farmer true true 100 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite heart 76 39/pause 1000/stopMusic/message "遥远的声音：哎呀哎呀哎呀……看看谁来了？"/warp LeahEx 74 29/move LeahEx 0 9 2 true/stopAnimation farmer/positionOffset farmer -16 0/faceDirection farmer 0 true/showFrame Leah 4/pause 50/positionOffset Leah -4 0/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah -4 0/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah -4 0/positionOffset farmer 4 0/pause 50/positionOffset Leah -4 0/positionOffset farmer 4 0/faceDirection Leah 0/pause 4000/showFrame LeahEx 4/move Leah -1 0 0/speak Leah "凯尔？？$6#$b#你怎么在这儿？$a"/fork LeahInternet choseInternet/message "凯尔：你在艺术展上没看见我吗？我大老远从祖祖城跑来看你的雕像。"/move LeahEx 0 1 2/message "凯尔：还有让你和我一起回去。"/message "凯尔：我想回到从前……我想你，宝贝。"/emote Leah 12/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "呸，少肉麻！$a#$b#你以前从来不支持我的艺术……现在我成功了，你就浪子回头了？真恶心。$a"/move Leah 0 2 2/showFrame LeahEx 4/message "凯尔：嘿！过来！"/speed farmer 4/move farmer -2 0 0 false/question fork1 "#朝凯尔脸上打一拳。#去跟凯尔讲道理。"/fork noPunch/pause 300/screenFlash .25/animate farmer false false 650 15/positionOffset farmer 0 -8/faceDirection Leah 0 true/playSound clubhit/showFrame LeahEx 6/jump LeahEx/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset farmer 0 8/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/pause 200/playSound clubSmash/showFrame LeahEx 7/shake LeahEx 1000/speak Leah "我的天啊！$6"/speed Leah 4/move Leah -1 0 0/speed Leah 4/move Leah 0 -4 1/emote Leah 40/pause 1700/speak Leah "他没事的……但还真是暴力。@。^她没事的……但还真是暴力。@。"/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "我们走吧凯尔不会再打扰我们了。"/speed farmer 2/positionOffset farmer 2 0/move farmer -1 0 0/move Leah 0 -8 0 true/move farmer 0 -8 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Leah "这次找个更僻静的地方吧……$l"/playMusic none/pause 2000/end dialogue Leah "这次的野餐没按我预想的那样进行下去。$h"
content.choseInternet: pause 10/message "凯尔：我找到了你的网上艺术商店……你就不好奇一直买你雕像的“K 先生”吗？"/pause 90/speak Leah "你就是“K 先生”？我……我以为就是以为喜欢我的艺术的富豪呢。$s"/move LeahEx 0 1 2/message "凯尔：嘿嘿。你猜对了一半……"/pause 1000/message "凯尔：莉亚，我想让你回到我身边。我想你，宝贝。"/emote Leah 12/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "咦，少肉麻了！$a#$b#你以前从来不支持我的艺术……现在我成功了，你就浪子回头了？真恶心。$a"/move Leah 0 2 2/showFrame LeahEx 4/message "凯尔：嘿！过来！"/speed farmer 4/move farmer -2 0 0 false/question fork1 "#朝凯尔脸上打一拳。#和凯尔理论。"/fork noPunch/pause 300/screenFlash .25/animate farmer false false 650 15/positionOffset farmer 0 -8/faceDirection Leah 0 true/playSound clubhit/showFrame LeahEx 6/jump LeahEx/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset farmer 0 8/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/pause 200/playSound clubSmash/showFrame LeahEx 7/shake LeahEx 1000/speak Leah "我的天啊！$6"/speed Leah 4/move Leah -1 0 0/speed Leah 4/move Leah 0 -4 1/emote Leah 40/pause 1700/speak Leah "他没事的……但还真是暴力，@。^她没事的……但还真是暴力，@。"/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "我们走吧。凯尔不会再打扰我们了。"/speed farmer 2/positionOffset farmer 2 0/move farmer -1 0 0/move Leah 0 -8 0 true/move farmer 0 -8 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Leah "这次找个更僻静的地方吧……$l"/playMusic none/pause 2000/end dialogue Leah "这次的野餐没按我预想的那样进行下去。$h"
content.noPunch: pause 10/message "凯尔：我跟你没什么好说的。给我滚开。"/speed farmer 2/move farmer 1 0 3/move LeahEx 0 2 2/message "凯尔：说真的，莉亚……你和这个头脑简单的乡巴佬在这里干什么呢？"/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Leah 26/pause 1000/showFrame Leah 27/showFrame 94/playSound clubhit/screenFlash .25/showFrame LeahEx 6/jump LeahEx/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset farmer 0 8/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/pause 200/playSound clubSmash/showFrame LeahEx 7/shake LeahEx 1000/stopAnimation farmer/speak Leah "@的各个方面都比你强多了！ $a^@从各方面来看都比你优秀得多！$a#$b#你赶紧滚吧，不要再回来了！$a"/move Leah -1 0 0/move Leah 0 -4 1/speak Leah "走吧。@。凯尔不会再打扰我们了。"/move farmer 0 1 2/faceDirection Leah 2 true/move farmer -2 0 0/move Leah 0 -11 0 true/move farmer 0 -11 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Leah "这次找个更僻静的地方吧……$l"/playMusic none/pause 2000/end dialogue Leah "这次的野餐没按我预想的那样进行下去。$h"
content.181928/f Penny 2000/t 900 1600/w sunny/G: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer 75 40 2 Penny 71 45 2 Jas 71 49 3 Vincent 70 49 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyFieldTrip/positionOffset Penny 0 -16/animate Jas false true 90 16 17 18 19/viewport 71 45 true/move farmer 0 5 3/pause 600/faceDirection Penny 1/pause 600/speak Penny "@！你来得正好。"/emote farmer 8/speak Penny "我要带孩子们去郊外农场进行一次小小的郊游。#$b#你对乡下生活很了解吧？$h"/speak Penny "$q -1 null#所以我就想……今天你能当我们的客座解说员吗？#$r -1 10 event_speaker_yes#我很乐意。#$r -1 0 event_speaker_yes#当然。#$r -1 -1500 event_speaker_no#不……我受不了小孩。"/fork eventEnd/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Penny 26/pause 500/shake Penny 500/speak Penny "贾斯！文森特！听我说！"/pause 80/stopAnimation Jas/faceDirection Jas 0 true/faceDirection Vincent 0/jump Vincent/jump Jas/pause 800/speed Vincent 4/speed Jas 4/move Vincent 0 -3 0 true/move Jas 0 -3 0 true/showFrame Penny 0/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Penny "我要为你们介绍一位特殊的嘉宾……我们当地的农夫，@。#$b#他对农村生活有着切身的体会……他知道谷里所有的“自然资源”！^她对农村生活有着切身的体会……她知道谷里所有的“自然资源”！"/pause 500/speak Penny "有人能告诉我什么是“自然资源”吗？"/animate Jas false true 50 20 21/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 1200/speak Penny "贾斯？"/stopAnimation Vincent/stopAnimation Jas/speak Jas "自然资源就是在自然状态下演化形成的物质资源储藏，有经济价值。$4"/faceDirection Vincent 1/speak Penny "很好！这个回答可以给两颗星，贾斯。"/speak Jas "好耶！$h"/faceDirection Vincent 0/speak Penny "那么，我们有请 @讲话。"/move Penny -1 0 1/move farmer -4 0 2/question fork0 "#乡村生活的全部就是耕种。#乡村生活的全部就是从大自然获得馈赠。"/fork choseFarming/pause 500/question fork0 "#这座山谷充满了珍贵的矿物。#这里的水域里生长着许许多多新鲜的海鲜。#你在格兰普立顿南部找不出比这里更好的木材。"/fork choseMinerals/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森特？"/speak Vincent "@先生，你会娶潘妮老师吗？$s^@女士……呃，你有男朋友吗？"/speak Penny "文森特！这问题太无礼了！注意你自己的言行，不然我就收回你今天所有的星星。$a"/emote Vincent 28/switchEvent fieldTripEnd
content.choseFarming: pause 500/question fork0 "#山谷的土壤非常适合种植蔬菜。#山谷的空气和青草很适合放牧。"/fork choseAnimals/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森特？"/speak Vincent "呃，@？如果我吃了你的蔬菜，我会长得像我哥哥山姆一样壮吗？#$b#他好好壮啊，昨晚他和潘妮老师爬树的时候，把她整个举起来了呢。$h"/showFrame Penny 27/jump Penny/pause 800/showFrame Penny 0/faceDirection farmer 3 true/emote Penny 12/speak Penny "文森特！别乱讲！$a"/switchEvent fieldTripEnd/
content.choseAnimals: pause 500/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森特？"/speak Vincent "@？我能在您的奶牛身上套一个鞍然后骑着它到镇里吗？我想成为真正的牛仔！"/speak Penny "文森特！注意自己的言行！@先生要靠农场为生呢！这可不是玩的地方$h^文森特！注意自己的言行！@小姐要靠农场为生呢！这可不是玩的地方。$h"/switchEvent fieldTripEnd
content.choseMinerals: pause 500/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森特？"/speak Vincent "@？山洞真的住着哥布林吗……它们真的会吃小孩吗？"/jump Jas/pause 800/faceDirection Jas 3/emote Jas 28/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/speak Penny "文森特！你吓到贾斯了。我们别聊怪物的事情了。$a"/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection Jas 0/emote Penny 12/pause 400/stopAnimation farmer/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 2/switchEvent fieldTripEnd
content.fieldTripEnd: pause 400/emote Penny 40/speak Penny "嗯，今天差不多就这样吧。你俩去玩吧。"/speed Jas 4/move Jas 0 3 1/speed Jas 4/move Jas 9 0 3 true/faceDirection Vincent 2 true/jump Vincent/pause 800/speed Vincent 4/move Vincent 0 3 1 false/speed Vincent 4/move Vincent 9 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Vincent 2/faceDirection Jas 2/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Penny "照顾这些孩子很累……$u#$b#但我不介意。我喜欢看着他们学习……我也希望能帮他们成长为优秀的人。"/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/speak Penny "$q -1 null#你想过要孩子吗，@？#$r -1 0 event_speaker_kids1#我还没认真想过。#$r -1 20 event_speaker_kids2#那当然，我想要很多孩子。#$r -1 20 event_speaker_kids3#有吧，这是人的本能愿望。#$r -1 10 event_speaker_kids4#没有，我觉得我不适合。#$r -1 -10 event_speaker_kids5#不想，这个世界的人已经够多了。#$r -1 -10 event_speaker_kids6#不想，我不想被家庭束缚。"/viewport move 1 0 10000/pause 7000/stopMusic/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/speak Penny "那好吧，我很高兴你能来，@。孩子们玩得很开心。$h"/end dialogue Penny "谢谢你让我们度过了一个有意义的郊游。"
content.eventEnd: faceDirection Penny 3/emote Penny 12/end dialogue Penny "真不敢相信你居然拒绝了我的请求。$a"
content.318560/j 10/t 900 1600/d Tue Wed Fri Sat: communityCenter/94 99/farmer 98 88 2 Jas 95 100 3 Vincent 93 100 1/playMusic communityCenter/skippable/move farmer 0 6 2 true/pause 1000/speak Jas "呃……好难闻。$s"/pause 600/jump Vincent/pause 500/faceDirection Vincent 0/pause 500/showFrame Vincent 16/shake Vincent 400/playSound clank/pause 800/shake Vincent 400/playSound clank/pause 800/showFrame Vincent 8/speak Vincent "……$s#$b#怎么锁上了？我还想去下水道里探索一番呢！$s"/pause 800/faceDirection Jas 0/pause 800/speak Jas "钥匙应该在冈瑟手里。"/pause 300/faceDirection Vincent 1/speak Vincent "冈瑟教授？开博物馆的那个？你为什么会觉得钥匙在他手里？$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 3/speak Jas "有一次，我见到一把生锈的大钥匙从他的口袋里掉了出来。#$b#这种瘆人的下水道大门一定得配一把生锈的旧钥匙。$4"/playMusic none/pause 2000/playSound slimeHit/pause 400/playSound slimeHit/pause 400/playSound slimeHit/pause 500/emote Vincent 8 true/emote Jas 8 true/pause 900/faceDirection Vincent 0 true/faceDirection Jas 0 true/pause 1600/playSound shadowpeep/shake Vincent 5000/shake Jas 5000/jump Jas/jump Vincent/faceDirection farmer 3 true/faceDirection Vincent 0 true/faceDirection Jas 0 true/pause 1500/playSound shadowDie/jump Vincent/jump Jas/pause 800/speed Vincent 6/speed Jas 6/advancedMove Jas false 4 0 0 -7 -1 0/advancedMove Vincent false 6 0 0 -8 -1 0/proceedPosition Vincent 98 92/faceDirection farmer 0 true/faceDirection Jas 2 true/faceDirection Vincent 2 true/speak Jas "里面有东西在动！$u"/shake Jas 4000/shake Vincent 4000/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/move farmer 0 6 3 false/move farmer -4 0 0/pause 800/emote farmer 40/pause 1600/playSound shadowpeep/faceDirection farmer 2 true/jump farmer/showFrame 94/jump Vincent/jump Jas/speed Jas 4/speed Vincent 4/move Jas 0 -6 0 true/move Vincent 0 -6 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
content.611944/f Shane 500/t 2000 2400: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 33 18 2 Shane 34 25 2/skippable/addLantern 735 35 25 1/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/viewport 34 25 true/move farmer 0 7 2/pause 2000/speak Shane "已经很晚了哈？"/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 20/pause 1000/speak Shane "给，来杯凉的。"/pause 500/showFrame Shane 25/pause 1000/playSound coin/showFrame 90/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 20/pause 5000/showFrame Shane 20/speak Shane "生活啊。"/playMusic echos/pause 4000/speak Shane "你有没有这种感觉……无论你做什么都会失败？#$b#就好像你陷入痛苦的深渊无法自拔，看不到一点光芒？"/pause 2000/speak Shane "我感觉不管我多努力……我都无法强大到从那个洞里爬出来。"/pause 3000/farmerEat 346/pause 4000/speak Shane "喝挺快啊？是个我欣赏的汉子。^喝挺快啊？是个我欣赏的姑娘。#$b#不过别上瘾了……你还有大好年华呢。"/pause 3000/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 19/speak Shane "哎哟……我的肝已经给我发警报了。那就晚安了。#$b#回头见，@。"/move Shane 0 -6 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
content.3910975/f Shane 1500/e 3910674/t 900 200: echos/-2000 -2000/farmer 83 92 2 Shane -3000 -3000 2 Harvey -3000 -3000 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite shaneCliffs/viewport 83 99 clamp true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 5 2/pause 500/speak Shane "……$7#$b#@……$7"/pause 1000/showFrame farmer 4/pause 1000/speak Shane "对……对不起……*打嗝*$7#$b#……$7#$b#我……我的人生……$7#$b#是个可悲的笑话……$7#$b#看着我……$7#$b#……$7#$b#我为什么要挣扎呢？……*抽咽*$7#$b#我根本掌控不了自己的人生……$7#$b#我只是……风中摇曳的一片垃圾……*打嗝*$7#$b#……$7#$b#我最近经常来这里……往下看……$7#$b#这是控制我人生的最后一个机会……这些悬崖……$7#$b#……$7#$b#但……但……*打嗝*……但是我太害怕，太焦虑。就像平时一样……$7"/pause 1000/showFrame farmer 0/pause 2000/speak Shane "@……我的人生就是工作，睡觉，吃喝……到……到自我仇恨的沮丧心情。$7#$b#为什么我还要继续？告诉我……告……告诉我为什么我不应该现在马上从悬崖边上滚下去……$7"/pause 1000/showFrame farmer 0/pause 1000/question shaneCliffs "#因为有太多的留恋！#贾斯需要你。你就像她的父亲。#因为这会是一种罪恶。#这是你自己的决定。我只知道为了你我会一直在这里。"/pause 500/pause 500/pause 500/pause 1000/speak Shane "@……$7"/pause 500/showFrame farmer 4/pause 1000/speak Shane "……我想你应该带我去医院了。$7"/pause 500/showFrame farmer 0/jump farmer/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic none/changeLocation Hospital/warp farmer 16 7/playMusic Hospital_Ambient/warp Harvey 16 6/faceDirection farmer 0/specificTemporarySprite shaneHospital/viewport 16 6 true/pause 2000/speak Harvey "……我已经帮他清洗过胃部并且对他身体进行了再水化。他会好起来的。#$b#总之，庆幸你及时把他送到医院。"/faceDirection Harvey 1/emote Harvey 28/speak Harvey "酒精太多会对身体造成很大负担……但是现在我最担心的是他的心理健康……$s#$b#当他醒来时，我会和他聊聊关于他的治疗方案。我认识祖祖城的一个优秀心理学家……"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Harvey "有时，生活会很痛苦……#$b#但是未来总是充满美好和希望的。你得学会相信它。"/pause 2000/end invisible Shane

Marnie 28/speak Leah "嘿，@……你觉得我应该画什么风格？我什么都行……"/pause 1000/quickQuestion #传统乡村肖像#多彩的复古流行艺术#极简主义现代风(break)speak Leah "保持传统风格是吗？好的，我想玛妮会喜欢的。"\addWorldState m_painting0(break)speak Leah "好主意！听起来很有趣……让我在调色板上再加一些黄色的颜料……"\addWorldState m_painting1(break)speak Leah "嗯……不是我通常的风格，但我可以试试。我最好换一个丙烯颜料……"\addWorldState m_painting2/pause 500/speak Leah "你的怎么样了？"/quickQuestion #完全就是杰作！#我还在尽力画……#看起来像狗爬一样(break)speak Leah "哇，我喜欢你的自信！$h#$b#谁说得准呢？也许你就是下一个卢皮尼呢！$h#$b#……我都等不及要看了。"(break)speak Leah "嘿，这就是我要的。如果你尽力去做，自然就会越来越擅长！"(break)speak Leah "嘿，没关系的！万事开头难。而且你永远都说不准，你的狗爬，对另一个人来说可能就是“现代艺术”。"/pause 500/textAboveHead Marnie "把我画得漂亮一点！"/pause 1500/textAboveHead Leah "嘘！"/pause 2300/speak Leah "好了，别忘了我教你的技巧……线条要粗，这样握画笔……"/pause 1000/playSound
